model.text:
Take the time to read the following information carefully, and don't hesitate to seek assistance if you have any questions or concerns.
  • The COVID-19 vaccine lowers the risk of contracting the virus and suffering from severe illness.
  • Please be aware that no vaccine is 100% effective, but getting vaccinated reduces the severity of any potential infection.
  • It may take a few weeks for your body to build up protection after receiving the vaccine, so continue to follow health guidelines during this period.
  • The vaccine may have side effects like other vaccines or medicines, but not everyone experiences them.
  • Common side effects include fever, pain at the injection site, redness and hardness of the skin at the injection site, headache, muscle and joint aches, fatigue, nausea/vomiting, chills, and underarm gland swelling on the side of study vaccination.
  • If you experience any side effects, please remain calm and consult your doctor immediately.
  • If you are pregnant or planning to become pregnant, or if your partner is planning to become pregnant, it's essential to consult your doctor before getting vaccinated to ensure it is safe for you.

model.error: This field must contain a valid e-mail address.

title.text: Do you have any chronic health condition?
List all diagnosed chronic health problems:
Have you been diagnosed with COVID-19?
Have you been immunized against COVID-19 before?
Have you been in contact with a COVID-19 positive person in the last 14 days?
Do you have any of the following symptoms?
